thread.title: event for person joining or leaving

comments.text: is there a way to detect when a player leaves or join? i'd like to set something up where someone can create an item using a spawner gun, then have the objects dissapear on leave
i'm new to anyland, so if this sounds like i'm thinking about it the wrong way just let me know
hey! so there is a few things you can detect
the script "when someone new in vicinity then..." will trigger each time anyone joins the area.
what you may want is to use "when told by body ..." there are plenty of triggers in there that just need to be on your body.
following what jinx said you can just use "when told by body person arrived in area then..." to detect someone joining your area from anywhere in your area.
there isnt any "... player left ..." scripts but when everyone leaves an area, the areas reset. area.variables and person.variables don't reset though.
is "person arived in area" built in or something i have to create?
i appreciate the fast responses btw.
for leaving i can just destroy them if they haven't been interacted with in a while.
typer "when told by body " and then tab through all the autocompletes to see what you can do.

thread.latestCommentText: typer "when told by body " and then tab through all the autocompletes to see what you can do.
